trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows menu control that enables you to hierarchically organize elements associated with commands and event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 功能表控制項，可讓您以階層架構的方式來組織與命令和事件處理常式關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> control presents a list of items that specify commands or options for an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>控制項呈現的項目，指定命令或應用程式的選項清單。

trans-unit.source: Typically, clicking an item on a menu opens a submenu or causes an application to carry out a command.
trans-unit.target: 通常按一下功能表上的項目會開啟子功能表，或是造成應用程式來執行命令。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is the most common type of item in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>是最常見的類型中之項目的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> can contain child items.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>可以包含子項目。

trans-unit.source: The child items will appear in a submenu when the user chooses a parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 子項目會出現在子功能表上，當使用者選擇父<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Menu Control
trans-unit.target: 自訂功能表控制項

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>控制項，可使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, see [Menu Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>，請參閱[功能表樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Menu" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Menu" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse button is pressed or released.
trans-unit.target: 按下或放開任何滑鼠按鈕時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Menu" /> receives a main menu activation notification.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Menu" /> 是否要接收主功能表啟動通知。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the menu receives a main menu activation notification; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果功能表要接收主功能表啟動通知，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> controls on a page, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> controls that should not receive ALT or F10 key notifications should set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>控制項在頁面上，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>應該不會收到 ALT 或 F10 鍵通知的控制項應該將此屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu.IsMainMenu%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> that does not receive activation notification.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu.IsMainMenu%2A>屬性以建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>不會收到啟用通知。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Menu.IsMainMenu" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Menu.IsMainMenu" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供這個控制項適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuAutomationPeer" /> 實作，做為 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 自動化基礎結構的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因型別而異的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="true" /> 時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 回應 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput" /> routed event that occurs when the menu receives text input from any device.
trans-unit.target: 處理當功能表收到來自任何裝置的文字輸入時，所發生的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput> event data.
trans-unit.target: 此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput>事件資料。

trans-unit.source: If you override <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Menu.OnTextInput(System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs)" />, always call the base implementation in your <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Menu.OnTextInput(System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs)" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Menu.OnTextInput(System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs)" />，務必呼叫基底實作您<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Menu.OnTextInput(System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs)" />實作。

trans-unit.source: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.
trans-unit.target: 無法呼叫基底實作可防止基底類別處理事件的類別處理常式，可能會變更的最終類別的執行階段行為。

trans-unit.source: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

trans-unit.source: The element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 用於顯示指定項目 (Item) 的項目 (Element)。

trans-unit.source: The item to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 準備指定項目 (Element) 以顯示指定項目 (Item)。

trans-unit.source: Preparing the element might involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 準備項目可能會涉及套用樣式、 設定繫結，並以此類推。
